channel.title: Please help with PKing problem
channel.description:
when any1 trys to PK on my server (has client), after attking for a while or just simply using a special attack, the client freezes and gives out this error:
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 103 at client.method34(client.java:1264) at client.method146(client.java:11792) at client.method102(client.java:7564) at client.method9(client.java:8463) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4256) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
If you can help with this problem it would be greatly appreciated. Also i'm using Butters' Client Base, and a lot of Galkons code sense Butters' was messed up a bunch when i downloaded it. (no offence intended there).
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Please help with PKing problem
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

hmmm crashing client… source phail?

item.title: Please help with PKing problem

item.description:

when any1 trys to PK on my server (has client), after attking for a while or just simply using a special attack, the client freezes and gives out this error:
